statements: DELETE FROM boxer_rankings WHERE wins > 10 AND boxing_category = 'Middleweight';
DELETE FROM boxer_rankings WHERE boxer_id = 101 AND boxing_category = 'Middleweight';
DELETE FROM boxer_rankings WHERE wins > 20 OR losses >= 10;
DELETE FROM matches WHERE match_id = 100 AND winner_id = 3;
DELETE FROM matches WHERE match_id = 101 AND match_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM match WHERE result='KO' AND date<'2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM boxer WHERE wins>50 AND weight_class='Heavyweight';
